evidence: applying a force at the right frequency so that every push adds up
RF signal has to be applied at the exact precessional frequency-the Larmor frequency
constant torque is what tips the magnetization away from the z-axis
rotating the vector from its equilibrium position into the transverse plane

triples.evidence: In MRI, the same idea holds. The RF signal has to be applied at the exact precessional frequency-the Larmor frequency.
That is resonance: applying a force at the right frequency so that every push adds up.
triples.o: applying a force at the right frequency

triples.evidence: So the revolving door is a nice analogy: push in rhythm with the rotation, and the system responds strongly.
